name: Darkrai
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.

poke_power.name: Darkness Shade
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Darkrai from your hand onto your Bench, you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Dark Slumber
attacks.effect: At the end of your opponent’s next turn, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Dark Resolve
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Asleep, remove 4 damage counters from Darkrai.
